[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [320 000] Gesamtergebnisrechnung, Gewinn oder Verlust, Umsatzkostenverfahren includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:ProfitLoss of 12,766,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 21,888,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of 0. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-05-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:ProfitLoss that should add to 12,766,000 are comprised of the following:
- IncomeTaxExpenseContinuingOperations -4,561,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 17,327,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [320 000] Gesamtergebnisrechnung, Gewinn oder Verlust, Umsatzkostenverfahren. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
